title: Discovery QRD-072: dimensional_fusion

core_mechanism: Core mechanism: An innovative proven parallel system fusing dimensions in Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(HybridClassicalQuantum) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_dimensional_fusion(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(HybridClassicalQuantum))
